name: Sitakant Machines
overview:
Established in the year 1927, we, “Sitkant Machines” are indulged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a comprehensive range of Sugarcane Crushers & Kitchen Equipment. In order to meet the diverging demands of the customers, we lay all our efforts in providing the superior quality products to our customers.

Our Team: Manufacturing professionals Quality controllers Workers Sales and marketing personnel Administration

Customer Satisfaction: Being a client-centric organization, we cater to the emerging demands of the clients. For the same, our quality experts stringently test these products on various parameters to ensure zero defect. Our packaging experts ensure safe packaging the timely delivery of the products tin order to gain the utmost satisfaction of the clients.

Quality: In order to meet the changing demands of the customers, we lay all our efforts in providing our clients quality assured range of products. For the same, we have associated ourselves with the most reliable vendors of the market for the procurement of the products required in the manufacturing of these products.

Why Us?: State-of-the-art infrastructure facility Skilled & experienced professionals Stringent quality control Adherence to international quality standards Timely delivery of the consignments Easy payment options

Market Leaders: The company is a market leader in meeting demands over the years in manufacturing and exporting of sugarcane crushers all over the state of Maharashtra and have achieved major breakthrough in export orders to developed and underdeveloped countries like Ashia, Europe, Africa and etc.
